volumeInfo.description: For undergraduate/graduate-level courses in Quality Control, Statistical Process Control, Quality Improvement and Quality Assurance. Practical and state-of-the-art in approach, this text provides fundamentalyet comprehensivecoverage of quality control concepts. Sufficient theory is presented to ensure that students gain a sound understanding of the basic principles of quality control. The substantial use of probability and statistical techniques is reduced to simple mathematics or is developed in the form of tables and charts.
volumeInfo.title: Quality Control

searchInfo.textSnippet: Practical and state-of-the-art in approach, this text provides fundamentalyet comprehensivecoverage of quality control concepts.
